fwdSensors.FwdSonarClient.fwdDistance: Returns the sensor's distance reading in meters
fwdSensors.FwdSonarClient.fwdDistancePas: Runs code when the distance goes over or under a set threshold
run when the distance is over or under your set threshold
what distance is the cut off before the code is run
fwdSensors.FwdSonarClient.fwdOnDistanceC: Runs code when the distance changes by more than a certain amount between readings
how many percent two readings have to differ by before code is run
